body_html:
I tried @nuchi's steps from June 25 to build but I keep getting the error below. Any ideas on what tests I can try to pin it down?

dyld: Symbol not found: _MKL_Detect_Cpu_Global_Lock
Referenced from: /usr/local/lib/libmkl_intel_lp64.dylib
Expected in: flat namespace
in /usr/local/lib/libmkl_intel_lp64.dylib
/bin/bash: line 1: 36400 Trace/BPT trap: 5 bazel-out/host/bin/tensorflow/contrib/image/gen_image_ops_py_wrappers_cc 0 > bazel-out/local-opt/genfiles/tensorflow/contrib/image/ops/gen_image_ops.py

body:
I tried @nuchi's steps from June 25 to build but I keep getting the error below. Any ideas on what tests I can try to pin it down?

dyld: Symbol not found: _MKL_Detect_Cpu_Global_Lock
  Referenced from: /usr/local/lib/libmkl_intel_lp64.dylib
  Expected in: flat namespace
 in /usr/local/lib/libmkl_intel_lp64.dylib
/bin/bash: line 1: 36400 Trace/BPT trap: 5       bazel-out/host/bin/tensorflow/contrib/image/gen_image_ops_py_wrappers_cc 0 > bazel-out/local-opt/genfiles/tensorflow/contrib/image/ops/gen_image_ops.py
